name: KM Sciences
tag_list: email, emails, efficiency, productivity, email-software, outlook-add-ins, conversation
overview:
KM Sciences Inc. develops email productivity software solutions. KM Sciences has a line of fully developed software solutions that address the growing and emerging market of email productivity.

The company offers EasyMailSuite, a family of products aimed at email user productivity; giving users better and richer information. The company’s flagship product, EasyLinkMail, is presented as a window displayed on the right side of the Microsoft Outlook user interface. This window displays the most frequently accessed email information: email conversations in chronological order (including replies and forwards), participants involved, related emails, attachments and a quick reply text box which allows the user to respond to an email without starting a new message. This format increases efficiency for users by viewing pertinent information in a side window without having to filter through or cut and paste scores of emails.

The five areas that KM Sciences has addressed with their products are: conversation consolidation, productivity improvement, mailbox trimming, business networking and contact management, and survey management.

KM Sciences was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Orange County, California.

milestones.description: Official release of CooWire- a response management tool that allows users to create any survey, newsletter or announcement then sends it to respondents via email. The responses are updated and tabulated in Excel.
